mentions.candidate: Andrew does a first-rate job in standing up for patients and local health services, so it's important we all turn out and vote to keep him as our MP on May 7th in order to safeguard our NHS.

issues.environment: Andrew. He stands up for a sustainable environment, social justice and educational opportunity.
issues.health: Andrew does a first-rate job in standing up for patients and local health services, so it's important we all turn out and vote to keep him as our MP on May 7th in order to safeguard our NHS.

contactInformation.address: Unit 4a, Bishop's Mews, Transport Way, OX4 6HD.

endorsements.endorsement: Andrew does a first-rate job in standing up for patients and local health services, so it's important we all turn out and vote to keep him as our MP on May 7th in order to safeguard our NHS.
As a first-time voter at the General Election, I’m looking forward to voting for Andrew. He stands up for a sustainable environment, social justice and educational opportunity.
Although I am not a supporter of the Labour Party, I do support Andrew. He is a person of great integrity, and an MP who does his best to represent everyone in Oxford East.
Whenever my family have needed help, Andrew has always been there for us - a friend, not just a politician. He understands what matters to local people and gets things done.

images.caption: Re-elect Andrew Smith. Oxford Labour. We're backing Andrew.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Support Andrew by displaying the reverse of this window in your window!
